argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

argument.name: Socket
argument.description: An INET::Socket object created with INET::Socket::Accept().

page.description: Begins an SSL session with a socket that is already opened. If successful the socket remains secure until closed. If unsuccessful both sockets will be closed. After this call you should no long reference OpenSocket.
page.discussion: The INET::Socket OpenSocket method begins an SSL session with a socket that is already opened. If successful, the socket remains secure until closed. If unsuccessful, both sockets close. After this call you should no longer reference OpenSocket.
